main.name: Janice Tsai
main.description: Interested in cloud computing, network, and security
main.bio: Aside from coding and learning new ways of solving problems, I really enjoy hiking, music, and beautiful sunsets.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Second year. Involved with Frontend and Backend Development Teams for Creative Labs, Bruin Hyperloop, Association of Computing Machinery, and Bruin Home Solutions. Co-Music Director of Road to Damascus Acapella. Affiliated with Asian American Christian Fellowship.
Learned programming, 3D modeling/design, machining, art, physics through hands-on projects. Attended Bay Area Maker Faire 2019 to showcase senior capstone project to thousands of people.

work.company: Bruin Home Solutions | The Data Grid
work.title: Backend Software Developer
work.description: Building a software distribution including a data collection app and web application that serves as centralized data management, macro data analysis, outreach/recruitment, public education tool, and a program development tool for all audit types. Using PostgreSQL, Express, and Javascript.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Using HTML, JavaScript, React, and CSS to execute on front and back-end development of the Bild platform, including onboarding manufacturers, user dashboards, and email integration. Helping build and maintain a platform that helps early-stage entrepreneurs find manufacturers for their tangible products and manage their supply chain needs. Maintained and updated landing page, build parts of product and platform, added live customer support chat feature.

work.company: Assocation of Computing Machinery | Teach LA
work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Developing an interactive module for students to learn tech related topics, including how the internet works. Using React, HTML, Javascript, and CSS.

projects.title: The Data Grid
projects.category: A software distribution for communities to share data and resources with our platform

projects.title: Smart Coffee Machine
projects.category: Hands free coffee machine controlled via bluetooth

projects.title: Resume Website
projects.category: A React based resume website template

testimonials.text: Janice is one of the most curious people I've ever met. She's driven by her desire to learn more.
I have really enjoyed working with Janice. She is one of the most hardworking young women I know.
